Docs.value: The value from this certificate's issuing Certificate Authority (CA).

remarks.para: This property is if any of the following are true:

ul.li: The encoded extension does not include an authorityCertIssuer value.
The authorityCertIssuer value contains no directoryName values.
The authorityCertIssuer value contains multiple directoryName values.
The directoryName value did not successfully decode as an .
